tool_description: A code to image translater similar to Codeshot
name: Code to Image
title: Code to Image

api_list.name: Code to Image
api_list.description: Convert code string to formatted image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://code-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "code-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://code-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "code-to-image1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
